item.description:
Join the Park Interpreter on a recreational hike each week into a different part of Myles Standish State Forest.  Each hike travels along different trails and is about 3 to 4 miles in length.  Please wear bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes.  Bring along water and a snack.  For adults and older children who can hike 3 to 4 miles of moderately difficult trails.  All children must be accompanied by an adult. 

Meetup Group members-- Let's try to get together when the hike starts. Sometimes these park events can draw a large crowd.  Let's meet around the map in the parking lot.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the park map in the parking lot.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Off the Beaten Path Hike
